text: Sperry is an unincorporated community in Adair County, in the U.S. state of Missouri. ==History== A post office called Sperry was established in 1883, and remained in operation until 1907. The community's name is a transfer from Sperry, Michigan. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Adair County, Missouri Category:Unincorporated communities in Missouri
title: Sperry, Missouri
